DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect data to support decisions made by BioFire regarding assay development, panel composition, and intended use for the final FilmArray FI reagent pouch. The study will utilize whole blood and/or plasma obtained from pediatric patients under 3 years of age that present with acute fever.
